body_html: @Yagun I have successfully built Tensorflow 1.5.0 on Windows 10 with CUDA 9.1 and CUDNN 7.0.5 using cmake and Visual Studio 2015 Update 3. Tested. Goto http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow-gpu-windows for step by step tutorial on "How to install Tensorflow 1.5.0 GPU with CUDA Toolkit 9.1 and cuDNN 7.0.5 for Python 3 on Windows OS". Let me know if it worked for you.
